message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the terms of the sale with you. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am interested in purchasing the product, and I would like to propose a price of $1300000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to negotiate further. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product for $1350000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. I am still looking to purchase the product within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $1325000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $1325000. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product for $1320000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
